hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/39f76d24cab23d43f6043b43f1766a67.png)

We can use subtraction to find the missing whole: $\pink{\Box} - \green{4} = \blue{16}$

We can also add all of the brownies together:  $\green{4} + \blue{16} = \pink{\Box}$

question.content:
There was a plate full of brownies. Tina ate $4$ of the brownies. There were $16$ brownies left.

**How many brownies were on the plate before Tina ate some? **

[[☃ input-number 1]]  brownies
